input.sentences: the small town had an old car festival .
someone even brought a horse and buggy !
classic cars drove up and down the street .
classic car collectors loved to show off .
everyone had a fun time looking at the old cars .
output.sentences: We jumped in the car and headed to the festival in town.
These people brought a horse and buggy.
Lots of people drove classic cars.
In particular, the collectors loved the classic cars.
I had a good time looking at the cars, it was a lot of fun.
